short_description: ehpad des abers is a senior care and assisted living facility based in france.
long_description: bienvenue à l'ehpad des abers. nous disposons de trois résidences sur landéda, lannilis et plouguerneau. notre accueil de jour l'escale propose des activités à la journée et bénéficie d'un service de transport aller-retour du domicile. notre service de soins à domicile vous propose un accompagnement de qualité par notre équipe soignante.
business_tags: old age homes | assisted care | domiciliary care services | domiciliary care | conveyancing services | site plan
generated_description: ehpad des abers is an assisted living facility located in lannilis, brittany. the company provides housing and care services for elderly individuals, including short-term and daily care, mental health support, and home care services. the facility offers various living options such as traditional ehpads, cocooning ehpads, and adapted living units. additionally, ehpad des abers operates a day care center called "escale" that provides daily activities and transportation services. the company also offers a home care service with a team of caregivers.
generated_business_tags: day care activities | home care | elderly care services | round trip transport services | retirement homes
